text:
user should be able to register for an account
user should be able to log into their account
user should be able to create a new category of cards
user should be able to create subcategory if necessary
user should be able to add an icon/image to a card
user should be able to create several cards for each category
user should be able to update categories, subcategories and cards
user should be able to delete categories, subcategories and cards
user should be able to select specific cards that will be displayed on a side panel
user should be able to share app with family and friends
user should be able to add their own images to cards
user should be able to make font larger or smaller as desired
user should be able to select a color scheme to customize their app
